name: BSHMM
tagline: Accurate and flexible methods for DNA methylation analysis, based on hidden Markov models.
body:
### Documentation
The documentation of the project will be available as soon as we've finished and validated the implementation.

Until then, feel free to take a look at the development progression on the Github page.

### Resources
The poster displayed on June 11th in the Centre de Recherche des Cordeliers is available via [this link](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/13627168/bshmm_poster.pdf).



![Affiliation](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/13627168/affiliation.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
